data.title: Clonezilla does not see USB HD formatted with linux file system [Archive]
data.meta_description: I am trying to test clonezilla to create an image file of my hard drive.  I want use a USB HD as the repository for that image. I had assumed that because that the external HD was not formatted with a linux file system, clonezilla was not seeing it. So I used GPARTED to wipe the HD then add a GPT table then formatted to ext4. Clonezilla still does not show that drive as an option when it comes time to mount it. Any idea as to why?
data.text:
